title: New mum Alesha Dixon shines as she makes her America's Got Talent debut

Alesha Dixon is across the pond making her America's Got Talent debut - after she announced she'd given birth to her second child earlier today.

The 40 year-old, who's also a judge on the UK version of the show, had her second child with boyfriend Azuka Ononye.

The pair already have six year-old Azuna, born in 2013.

She first announced she was pregnant of national TV during Britain' Got Talent, with the help of hosts Ant and Dec.

Now she's set to take the States by storm as she joins the judging panel alongside head honcho Simon Cowell and supermodel Heidi Klum.

(Image: aleshaofficial/Instagram)

(Image: aleshaofficial/Instagram)

The star posted a boomerang of her getting her makeup topped up, followed later by a video in which she, Simon and Heidi say hello to David Walliams back in the UK.

David judges with Alesha and Simon, as well as Amanda Holden, on Britain's Got Talent.

"It's going great, David!" Alesha screams over the noise of the crowds.

(Image: aleshaofficial/Instagram)

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

Simon adds: "There's an amazing atmosphere here! Hope you enjoy the show when it comes out!"

Alesha then turns the camera on third judge Heidi, shouting: "Say hi, Heidi! This is for David."

"Hi David!" Heidi chirps. Later she chimes in: "I don't know you, but hi."

Britain's Got Talent: The Champions will draw to a close tomorrow evening, with the final expected to have fans talking.

Alesha's been a judge on the show since 2012, joining ITV from the BBC where she had been a judge on Strictly Come Dancing .

She had previously won the dance contest in 2007.
description: Alesha announced the birth of her second child earlier today, and now she's over the US filming for her first series of America's Got Talent
